hasDitaContent.@value: Both tolfenamic acid and tobramycin can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tolfenamic acid  and  tobramycin  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tolfenamic acid and tolvaptan can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tolfenamic acid  and  tolvaptan  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tolfenamic acid and torasemide can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tolfenamic acid  and  torasemide  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Tolfenamic acid causes bleeding, as can trametinib ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tolfenamic acid   causes   bleeding, as can   trametinib   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tolfenamic acid and trandolapril can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Tolfenamic acid increases the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with triamcinolone. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tolfenamic acid   increases   the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with   triamcinolone .  Manufacturer advises caution .
